data.name: Scholar
data.description:
Support unit with no combat capability. Can be garrisoned in a Mosque or Madrasa to research technology more quickly. Can pick up Relics, convert enemy units, and capture Sacred Sites starting in the Castle Age (III).

+ Heals friendly units

- Low health

variations.name: Scholar
variations.description:

+ Heals friendly units

- Low health

data.name: Tower Elephant
data.description:
Powerful ranged cavalry that can fire while moving.

+ High health

+ Mounted with powerful archers

+ Capable of attacking Stone Walls

- Slow movement speed

data.name: War Elephant
data.description:
Heavy cavalry effective against cavalry, siege weapons, walls, and buildings.

+ High health and armor

+ Mounted with an advanced Spearman

+ Capable of attacking Stone Walls

- Slow movement speed

data.name: Scout
data.description:
Lightly armed cavalry effective at exploring the world, hunting wildlife, and herding Sheep.

+ Able to see into Stealth Forests

+ High movement speed

- Very weak in combat

data.name: Siege Tower
data.description:
Tall infantry transport with no combat capability. Allows garrisoned infantry to be unloaded directly onto Stone Walls.

+ High ranged armor

- Cannot attack

- Slow movement speed

data.description:

data.name: Springald
data.description:
Effective at taking out high value targets at long range. Fires after quickly setting up.

+ Long range

+ Bonus damage vs siege engines

- Trivial damage vs. buildings

variations.name: Springald
variations.description:

data.name: Trader
data.description: Traders generate Gold when assigned to trade with a Trade Post or another players Market. Once assigned to trade, the Trader makes repeated trips between its Home Market and the Trade Target. You can assign a new Home Market if you wish to.

variations.name: Trader
variations.description: Traders generate Gold when assigned to trade with a Trade Post or another players Market. Once assigned to trade, the Trader makes repeated trips between its Home Market and the Trade Target. You can assign a new Home Market if you wish to.

data.name: Trebuchet
data.description:
Powerful siege engine effective at destroying buildings and walls over a great distance.

+ Bonus damage vs buildings

- Must be set up to fire

- Inaccurate against units

variations.description:

data.name: Villager
data.description:
Gathers Wood, Food, Stone, and Gold. Builds and repairs buildings and can repair siege engines and naval units.

- Weak in combat
